article.title: My DIY Smart Sprinklers
article.author: Tom Rodrigues
article.excerpt: Smart sprinkler systems make caring for your garden dynamic and easy. How easy is it to make our own instead?

authors.bio: Hey, I’m Tom. Check out my posts, I’m sure you’ll find something interesting…
authors.name: Tom Rodrigues
